= How to do stuff =

 * disable laptop keyboard
  {{{
  xinput list

  xinput float ID

  xinput reattach ID SLAVE_ID
  }}}

  * check auth logs in ubuntu server
    /var/log/auth.log

  * search for text inside a file
  {{{
    grep 'test' filename

    grep -v 'test' filename # only lines that don't containt test
  }}}

  * unzip a file
  {{{
      gzip -d filename.gz # -d means decompress
  }}}
